message.body: Rise and shine!
Where's it good for that?
Are we on for tonight? Anyone free soon?
I'm down.
I don't have waterproof gear either lol
Should I meet you at the art museum area it somewhere else first?
Or, not it
It's like, have you gone outside yet lol
Would you go sledding with the little ones?
Is that a serious question?
Hahah.
Yes and no haha
Sorry I didn't get back to you sooner, it's been an off day, well more than usual.
Understandable. You have the little ones to watch after
I didn't sleep at all last night, and i just woke up from a nap. Just had to get some sleep.
Good job. Your back is okay I hope?
Yeah sleep hasn't been easy for me either.
Yea, apologies for the late-night texts.
Don't. I texted you.
Ready for your sledding adventure?
Mentally I guess.
Seems it'll only be 3 of us though
Sounds like fun.
Sorry if I seem intruding but would you need anything brought to you? I wasn't sure if you were stranded at the house lol
The twins (my nephews) might not quite be ready to enjoy such excitement yet.

No that's so nice of you to ask! I think we're good. Thanks. Uyen reminded me I might have to go shovel some snow after she said she did. For some reason, I didn't think we'd be getting this much snow even though I heard it on the news.
Me neither. Do be careful. With your tiny back and all lol
Luckily I only had to shovel a little portion of sidewalk and dig out my car so it's not completely frozen over
Oh thanks...make me sounds so capable there...
It's just... You're petite. And even I felt tired shoveling the snow. It's heavy.
Lucky you. I have steps, pathways, and sidewalks.
Time to buy a snow blower lol
Oh that could be fun!
Have you shoveled yet? If it isn't already cleared it's gonna be ice by tomorrow
Hahah I was going to text you!
Slipped my mind. My toes were getting numb!
Oh? What about?
Oh no :(
Sometimes, nature does the framing for you. Mt. Whitney, CA. [OC] [4338 x 2892] http://imgur.com/cDjqQO6
I shoveled my house, cleaned/dug my car out, and shoveled my sister's house too.
I'm quite proud.
I expected it to be colder.
Such a great little trooper you are
It will be tomorrow lol.
Bummer.
I need to reset my sleep. Starting to break out again =/
You may get sore tomorrow. Hope you're ready
I don't think I exerted myself that much.
That's good.
We shall see.
How was sledding?
Didn't go. Cindy called it off.
Oh what happened?
Scott wasn't feeling how the number was small and I wasn't feeling so hot
Intriguing. http://imgur.com/r9lfoTo
I see. At least you stayed warm :)
Okay, and about that image, it took me a few moments to get it (that is, of I actually got it).
Hahah how complex.
Sneaky, makes you think!
Haha yeah. It's a cross between humor and something kinda scary in a way
I only slept for four hours but I feel so refreshed!
How's your day going?
You most likely hit the specific part of your sleep cycle that was best to wake up from. It's going ok. I'm feeling refreshed myself.
I have a full schedule at work so I'm lucky I got to sleep for 6 hours heh
That's good. Guess it's not a bad way to start a Friday!
Oh my, busy man!
And btw, Happy Friday!!!
Thank ya, ditto :) What's on your schedule at the sister's?

I'm currently at home. I told my mom and sister I needed a good night's sleep since I pretty much pulled all-nighters for the last three days. So I'm going to get ready, pack, and head back over there later to relieve my sister of babysitting duties.
That's sweet of ya. I'm gonna pack just about everything tonight. Moving out tomorrow. Just have my bedroom, a desk, and some kitchen stuff.
What?! You're officially moving?
Haha just new apartment. I'm not leaving the city. Aww you'd actually miss me?
I'm surprised that it happened thi soon.
*this
I know. Feels like yesterday I was just going crazy searching for a place.
